seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Letting Go
body: Omega participants Joe, Margot and Ira share personal journeys towards greater well-being.  These particular stories reveal the power of loving and letting go.  Each of the stories reveal how the letting go of a past relationship with a loved one has helped them to discover and to understand themselves on a deeper, more spiritual level.  Each of their transformations resulted in a lesson that brought them a newfound understanding of how to manage and cope with other difficult situations and challenges in all facets of their lives.
teaser: Three stories from Omega participants reveal the personal and spiritual journey of letting go of a loved one, and the self-healing that their journey brought to their lives.
cast: Margot Anadn, Joe Montaperto, Ira Gunter

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Illness As Teacher
body: Pain and disease are terrible burdens to bear, indeed. However, even moments of duress can be the most subtle of teachers. Three women share their incredible stories of recovery revealing what they have learned about themselves, love and life.
teaser: Gayle, Serita, and Julie share challenges and empowering breakthroughs of how illness teaches them on their spiritual journeys.
cast: Gayle Coursol, Serita Winthrop, Julie Cooper

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Finding Your Calling
body: What's your spiritual journey, your soul story? Journey with three incredible people and their life-altering stories, as they transform fear, depression, and confusion into transcendence, love and peace. An independent filmmaker from Toronto, Canada, has premonitions of professional success following an auto accident. A ranger company commander and 3rd-generation army officer, during a freak accident, is visited by an angel with the message for him to choose another path, to teach peace. A man traumatically leaves his soulmate in New York City to heed his higher calling to help others.
teaser: What's your spiritual journey, your soul story? Journey with three incredible people and their life-altering stories, as they transform fear, depression, and confusion into transcendence, love and peace.

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Finding Your Voice
body: Samantha, Ysaye, and Susan, Omega Institute participants, share their spiritual journeys toward greater awareness and well-being. Samantha learns true self love and the fulfillment that comes from taking risks, once she discovers a diagnosis of throat cancer. Ysaye, rooted in her health studies and service, finds a much larger plan at work through the power of her voice. Susan, a New York actress and singer down on her luck finds the magic to manifest her stage dream. Be touched, moved and inspired as each opens their heart to compassion, love, and new beginnings.
teaser: Join three Omega Institute participants on their spiritual journeys toward greater awareness and well-being.

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Transforming Through Illness
body:
Gigi, Thom, Beth and Lieve, Omega Institute participants, share their spiritual journeys toward greater awareness and well-being. 

As a youth, Gigi became a seeker so as not to accept her illness as her fate. Thom heeded a dramatic wake-up call  when he got a diagnosis of six months to live due to a sports injury that uncovered adrenal, liver, and kidney malfunction. Inspired to overcome these major imbalances, he has found success through yogic practice. Beth's recovery from a burst appendix during the birth of her son has been her unique call to centering practice. Lieve changed her life of outer success to embrace inner awareness through a challenging journey with chronic fatigue syndrome. 

We find ourselves moved and inspired by viewing each of these challenges as whole mind-body-spirit experiences of growth and healing, rather than dissociated physical body break-downs. Experience the magic and transformation first-hand as each of these beautiful souls courageously open their hearts to compassion, love, and service in the face of illness.
teaser: Experience the inspiration of Omega Institute participants sharing their spiritual journeys from illness toward greater awareness and well-being.
cast: Thom Birch, Gigi Jantos, Beth Liberman, Lieve Cornet

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: The Search
body:
These are Soul stories from four Omega Participants: Louis, Lama Surya Das, Anodea, and Debbie.  Each of the participant's stories is about finding their own true self. Each of the participants has entered into a more meaningful and full life, by letting go of their attachment to the material world.  

With the abandonment of unnecessary material goods, and the quest for monetary reward, each of the participants became more connected to themselves, and more in tune with the pure essence of life and living, as well as the beauty of the world around them.
teaser: Four Soul Stories from Omega participants on the quest of self-discovery.  Each story describes a spiritual path that brings about self-discovery and renewal.
cast: Lama Surya Das, Anodea Judith, Louis Conselatore, Debbie Kelley

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Turning Your Life Around
body:
Four Omega Institute participants have unique spiritual breakthroughs and share snapshots of their personal transformations towards greater love, awareness and service. Now a pioneer in spiritual psychology, Jackie was transformed through unexpected spiritual guidance at the dissolution of her marriage. Miriam, a New Jersey woman traveling in New Mexico and offering prayers of healing service for humanity has a direct realization that she is physically manifested light. 

Chris survived a dysfunctional family pattern of drug addiction through the love of his children. Newly awakened to the reality that all her needs would be met as she lives a life of participatory service, Shuli was able to film a sequel to her documentary of the women's peace movement in Israel on the West Bank in Gaza. Be moved and inspired as they open their hearts to compassion, love, and new beginnings.
teaser: Four Omega Institute participants have unique spiritual breakthroughs and share snapshots of their personal transformations toward greater love, awareness and service.

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Starting Over
body: Soul Stories from four Omega participants who share their intimate stories of “Starting Over.”  The participants talk about their past lives and the spiritual journeys that have changed them and given them a true second chance at life.
teaser: Soul Stories from four Omega participants who share their intimate stories about “Starting Over.”

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Changing the World
body: What kind of lesson do we learn on our individual spiritual journeys?  Three exceptional people tell their stories of personal transformation that brought hope and peace into the world. Meet Ananda, Kofi, and Paul and listen to their inspirational stories of hope and healing.
teaser: Three Omega participants discuss their spiritual journeys of hope, healing, and love.

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Overcoming Addiction
body:
Doug, a Canadian, lost focus and dropped out of college, partaking of a constant supply of drugs and alcohol. At a loss to provide value to anyone else, he journeyed long and hard to find his way to consciousness, love and the joy of living simply and honestly. 

Joanne found her way out of compulsive overeating and obesity through a three-fold method addressing spiritual, physical and emotional recovery. Practicing staying present and riding the raw feelings accompanying jealousy, judgment, hurt, etc., has helped her accept and love herself without turning to food to bury them. 

Brian was a troublemaker from early on. A gang member and drug runner, he exploited or victimized anything or anyone he could take advantage of – family, friends, strangers – to get what he needed or wanted. At a life or death turning point he chose to get more in touch with himself, to feel his life and to invite conscious spirituality back into it.
teaser: Doug, Joanne and Brian share their soul stories of challenge and courageous recovery in overcoming strong additions to hard and soft drugs, violence, alcohol and overeating.
cast: Doug Stewart, Joanne Goodman, Brian Whitehead

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Life After Death
body:
Rondi, Christa, Linda, and Oriah, Omega Institute participants, share their spiritual journeys toward greater awareness and well-being. Rondi discovers talents and experiences she didn't know she was capable of while caring for her husband during his cancer. Christa finds herself spontaneously conversing with her friend who has passed on and hopes to convey trust in life after death to others. 

Linda gets an auditory premonition of a significant event and loving guidance from her deceased husband toward her spiritual growth. Through meditation Oriah connects with her friend in a coma, who then comes out of it the next day. Be moved and inspired as they open their hearts to compassion, love, and new beginnings.
teaser: Join four Omega Institute participants on their spiritual journeys toward greater awareness and well-being.
cast: Oriah Mountain Dreamer, Rondi Ligtmark, Christa Johnson, Linda Gentry

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Finding Faith
body:
Three stories of very different people and how they became spiritually alive through three very different paths and experiences.
 
Andrew Harvey learned of his father dying in India. When he returned back home, he tells of an ecstatic religious experience and how he brought that into the world. 

Christina Pratt, a shamanic healer, tells of her struggles of having a regular job and life. She describes her shift coming as a “crazy woman” contrarily leading her to a new path. 

Stephen Cope’s tale begins in graduate school where he stumbles onto his innate talent for meditation. After building a successful psychotherapy practice, he took a leap of faith and took a year off to enter into deep yogic meditation at the Kripalu Center.
teaser: Three Omega participants discuss their spiritual journeys and their search for faith.
cast: Andrew Harvey, Christine Pratt, Stephen Cope

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Psychic Pathway and Yoga Darshana (Sonia Choquette & Kofi Busia)
body:
Part 1: If you want to become as comfortable with your sixth sense as you are with the other five, to talk to your angels as easily as you brush your teeth, then consult with Sonia Choquette, self-described intuitive, spiritual teacher, healer, and model for people about how to be in spirit. Sonia will awaken your psychic abilities, introduce you to the spirit world, and help you remember what you came here to do. Encouraged by her mother to expand her abilities, she began giving readings at age twelve and has been helping people connect with their souls and their guides for over thirty years. 

Part 2: An early student of B. K. S. Iyengar, who stressed alignment and therapeutic benefit, Kofi Busia is a master of personal attention and maximizing students' progress, and his classes are among the most popular at Omega.  What attracts people, in addition to the physical asana practice, are the ethical and moral disciplines that deepen one's way of life and philosophy – mindfulness, joy, right action. Kofia notes that one of the most valuable commodities that yoga has to offer is steadiness of mind. Our challenge is to resist the obstacles, both inner and outer, that take us away from our focus on whatever goals we have set.
teaser: From the Omega Institute, first meet Sonia Choquette, intuitive, spiritual teacher, and healer, who will awaken your psychic abilities, introduce you to the spirit world, and help you remember what you came here to do. Then, Kofi Busia, a much sought-after yoga instructor, discusses and demonstrates the Iyengar method, which stresses alignment and very precise positioning of the body, while maintaining strong inner focus.
cast: Sonia Choquette, Sandra Garcia, Kofi Busia

seriesTitle: Eye of the Spirit: Soul Stories
title: Shapeshifting with Star Guides and Kundalini Yoga (John Perkins & Gurmukh Khalsa)
body:
Part 1: Shaman - a man or woman who travels to other worlds and uses the knowledge gained to affect change in this one. Interest in shamanism has exploded in the west, and at the epicenter is John Perkins. Giving up a successful life in the energy industry, he devotes his life to a different kind of energy now: Shamanic Healing. John gathered together shamans from all over the world to usher in a new era, one where ancient wisdom is so needed by our modern times.                                                                                                                                              

Part 2: Gurmukh Khalsa, founder of the kundalini yoga center in Los Angeles, combines breath, posture and awareness of vital force in her practice of kundalini yoga. Working on the radiant body and the light around you, she invites you to experience your own energy in relation to this vast healing repository, this yoga of the mystics. A sikh by choice, she expounds the unified truth in all religions and practices.
teaser: Part 1: Giving up a successful life in the energy industry, John Perkins devotes his life to a different kind of energy: Shamanic Healing. Part 2: Working on the radiant body and the light around you, Gurmukh Khalsa invites you to experience your own energy in relation to this vast healing repository, Kundalini, the yoga of the mystics.
